attributes.action: Rid the Uk of period poverty and allow free access to female hygiene products.
attributes.additional_details: Period poverty is a huge issue in the uk as a whole and that needs to change. Many households who struggle with money, struggle to afford female hygiene products. Make them a human right to be free. Periods should not be capitalised on.
attributes.background: Follow in the footsteps of the Scottish government and make female hygiene products free and accessible to those who need them.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Fund free female sanitary products, such as sanitary towels and tampons
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555551
